title.narrative: Improving income, assets and food security of 3,200 women affected by conflict and poverty in South Kivu, DRC and Ruhango District, Rwanda

description.narrative: The project aims to improve income, assets and food security for 3,200 women affected by conflict and poverty in South Kivu, DRC and in Kigoma Sector and Ruhango District, Rwanda, through increased productivity in agriculture and micro-enterprises via skills development, self help groups, quality agricultural inputs, access to credit and strong leadership. In support of these aims the project includes a complementary health and justice component.;
